name: Spray Ball – Brain Challenge
description:
Do you like taking on the hardest puzzle games ever to constantly push your brain thinking skills to the edge? If your answer is yes, then Spray Ball – Brain Challenge Mind Puzzle is just the perfect puzzling game for you right now! In a constantly challenging strategy logic puzzle balls, you need to find the fastest and easiest way to match the colors as the level demands! Try to be fast, implement the best strategic moves and solve the logic puzzles with the least moves.

SPRAY COLORS IN THE RIGHT WAY

With its unique logic mind challenge, Spray Ball is one of the coolest and greatest puzzle games you can enjoy on your phone or tablet for FREE now. Spray Ball is the latest addictive strategy game for your mobile devices. The main objective of this logic game is to take a look at the given ball and try to create the same using 6 spray colors! But, keep in mind that you will have to surpass the levels with the minimum of movements to get 3 stars. The less movements, the closer you are to 3 stars.

INCREASINGLY CHALLENGING AND HARD

This addictive game will get harder as your progress. But you’ll love it! Show great strategy, reflexes, fast thinking to achieve the highest possible score. You’ll instantly realize that Spray Ball is an awesome brain challenging game, one that relies on your speed and reflection to get higher score. Train your hand and eye coordination with this free logic game and have fun playing for hours, you will not feel bored even if you play it for many hours. When you are waiting in line, when you are on a break, or when you are riding a bus or train, play this fun and addictive free color ball game on the go. Your reflection, thinking and strategic thinking needs training too!

UNIQUE IDEA

Spray Ball comes with a great and unique idea. It also comes with a very different style and a new gameplay from the classic puzzle game. The environment of playing is amazing and you will never feel bored. The goal is to make sure that you paint a ball and let it be the same of the given one without doing too much movements.
Sounds easy, but can you really do it and finish each level in this strategic, brain challenging game?

WHY SPRAY BALL?

Why you need to download and install Spray Ball – Brain Challenge Mind Strategic Puzzle logic game on your Smartphone or Tablet for Free instead of other fun for the brain puzzle games?
- We made some Cool and smooth high quality balls and awesome colors to give you the best experience while playing the greatest colors game ever! You will enjoy playing!
- Spray Ball is FREE and it will stay Free for life, so there is No hidden fees, no special memberships and no annual subscription to enjoy the best reflection thinking game ever!
- We have 40 levels inside our color matching puzzler. Each level is harder than the previous. We guarantee that you will have hours of fun while playing Spray Ball.
- Fantastic graphics and immersive sound effects. We took design seriously and we want our users to enjoy this game immensely.
- You can use 4 tools and 6 colors to complete each level and go to the following one.
- On occasion, it's not possible to finish a level in the first try. But, Don't Give Up and try again, you will do it!
- We included the solution of each level. Try to not use it and use your own skills to finish levels.
- This brain teaser for adults is for intelligent people who want to challenge their brain playing a free addictive puzzler.
- Spray Ball is a free game and it can be played by Adults and Teens. Your whole family can play it and they will enjoy the best strategy mind puzzle game ever!
- Play this mind puzzle offline – no need for internet
- Our brain teaser game is responsive and compatible with all smartphones and tablets sizes
- Great enjoyable UI to test your brain thinking skills and improve them with this awesome brain puzzle game.

Get it for free now, and enjoy one of the best free puzzle games of the year!
